title: @Meddler is MF going to get buffed/reworked/changed in the next patch aimed for competitive play?
body:
Yes/No?

She's been pretty lackluster in competitive play ever since the E nerfs so i'm wondering if you just gave up or anything.

replies.body: We don't have any current plans for MF. We don't balance solely around pro play to begin with, even there though she's been picked a couple of times in the last couple of weeks (LPL and EU LCS) which suggests she's in a reasonable spot.
What about Karma and Viktor? You mentioned them in your post a few days ago but didn't answer any questions about them after. Are you considering nerfs to them?
Considering yeah. Nothing concrete or definite as of yet, still assessing.

I get so annoyed when you dont give a definite answer. _Maybe, still assessing, Thinking about it, Discussing_ God dammit meddler, just say yes or no pls. So who are u actually considering to change in the upcoming patch? thank you.

The issue behind him doing this is that people then build expectations. 
It's like with the Voice Chat feature. If they confirm it, people get excited.
If due to complications it cannot be implemented people will go insane. 
It occured when they were looking into Zed's nerfs 2 - 3 patches ago on his Q and Ult/R. They released information on his Ult being nerfed and then it was reverted, the boards went insane.
Tbh it was warranted considering the Rioter behind the QSS nerf post was a massive dick too a lot of people, but regardless the sentiment is there that confirming changes to champions before they are being iterated is never a good thing.

Please don't nerf Karma. She has a middling winrate at plat+ as it is, and the way you guys refuse to actually give her an identity means she's gotta have something, even if that something has to be a little bit of everything. Because of the lack of identity.

The idea of Karma getting like... her 1st nerf ever is mildly hilarious actually xD. I hope you come to the conclusion it's just a power shift she needs, preferably something to restore the mantra diversity those 5.10 changes took away..

you are doing a patch dedicated to tuning for worlds... aren't you?
Please dont use this line.
Love you love the game
